item.description:
Come join us for a great night of wonderful food at Fiore II Restaurant on Wednesday 03/30/11 at 7:oopm.  With the "everyone's family" feel of an Italian trattoria, our friendly staff strives to offer excellent food and attentive service. With signature dishes like Veal Fiore and classic standards like linguini with clam sauce, our talented chef creates memorable meals that are sure to impress. "Mangia bene, vivi felice" (Eat well, live happy)!

The websit is:  http://www.fioremiddletown.com/  

Fiore II Restaurant phone 860-344-5557

As always, I will collect $1.00 for "dues".  Please make sure to change your RSVP by 5:00pm the day PRIOR to the event if need be, and all "YES"'s are expected to attend.

- Dianne and Betsy

group.name: The Ethnic Dining Enthusiasts Meetup Group

item.name: Fiore II Restaurant 3/30/11 7:00pm
